text: sau allahani samaksa ubha rahese, te samaye asakta loko ahankari'one kahese, ke ame to tamarum anusarana karanara hata to sum tame allahani yatana manthi thodika yatana dura kari sako cho? Te'o javaba apase ke jo allaha amane satyamarga batavato, to ame pana kharekhara tamarum margadarsana karata, have to amara para aphasosa karo athava dhairya rakho, banne sarakhum che, apana mate ko'i chutakaro nathi
